#p2100001# of #m260000000# says he'll make the sword if you bring him the items to ornament it with: #b#t4031568#s#k, #b#t4000335#s#k, and #b5,000 mesos#k.

#i4031568# #t4031568# #b#c4031568##k/4 
#i4000335# #t4000335# #b#c4000335##k/30
You gathered the materials required to make the Dancer Sword, along with 5,000 mesos, and gave them all to #p2100001#. That should be enough for him to craft the sword.
뭘 만들어 주길 바라는 것인가? 음? 무희용 칼이라고? 보나마나 #p2101000#의 부탁을 받고 온 모양이군. 무희가 쓸만한 장식용 칼은 만들어 줄 수 없다. 안 그래도 물자가 부족한 #m260000000#에서 그런 걸 만드는데 보석을 쓸 수야 없지... 하지만...
칼을 만드는 것 자체는 그리 어려운 것이 아니니, 네가 칼을 장식할 재료들을 모두 구해 온다면 무희용 칼을 만들어 주지. 예전부터 칼을 달라고 부탁하던 #p2101000#였는데 항상 거절했으니... 재료만 구해 오면 만들어 주마. 어떠냐?
호언장담하는 걸 보니 자신 있는 모양이구만. 그렇다면 어서 가서 칼의 손잡이를 장식할 #t4031568# 4개와 #t4000335# 30개를 구해 오도록. 물론 칼에 들어가는 철 값 5000메소는 따로 내야 한다. 거기까지 할 자신이 있느냐?
#t4031568#은 #o2100108#에게서, #t4000335#는 #o3100102#에게서 구하면 될 것이다. 그것만 가져 온다면 #p2101000#에게 꼭 어울릴 화려한 무희용 칼을 만들어 주지.
흠. 재료를 구할 자신이 없는 모양이지? #p2101000#가 아쉬워하겠군...
What do you want me to make? A sword for dancers? I bet #p2101000# asked you, right? I am sorry, but I can't help. The taxes on dancer's swords have gone up, so I won't make any. But...

Making the sword itself wouldn't be a tough task... All right, if you can get all the materials used to ornament the sword, I'll make it for you. I've refused #p2101000# all this time, but I'll make one if you bring the materials, okay?

Woah, you must be confident. Then get me #b4 #t4031568#s#k and #b30 #t4000335#s#k to decorate the handle of the sword. Of course, you'll also have to pay #b5,000 mesos#k for the amount of iron that's going towards making the blade. Are you sure you want to do this?
You can get #b#t4031568#s#k from #r#o2100108##k and #b#t4000335#s#k from #r#o3100102#s#k. Once you bring them all, I'll make a fancy dancer sword worthy of #p2101000#.
So you brought all the materials needed to decorate the handle? Then show me. Woah, you did bring them all. This should be enough to make the fanciest sword in #m260000000#.
You don't think the sword will be made instantly, do you? It may not be used for combat, but it's not easy to make a sword, period. So please wait a bit.
You don't have all the materials yet. If you're lacking anything, the sword will not turn out perfectly. Bring #b4 #t4031568#s#k and #b30 #t4000335#s#k, along with #b5,000 mesos#k.
